section.name: About this Document
section.p: This document provides release notes for the Cytoscape Data Services Layer project.

OL.LI: Emulates basic database functionality fround in Osprey, including the ability to retrieve individual protein data, and interactions associated with proteins. New GRID interactions can be easily added to the Cytoscape graph.
Includes first draft implementation of entire Cytoscape Data Services API.
Includes data services for retrieving data directly from the GRID mySQL database.
Includes data services for retrieving GenBank Flat Files from NCBI. GenBank flat files are subsequently parsed via BioJava.
Includes a basic caching layer for caching all data objects locally within memory.
All web connections currently use the HttpClient library from Jakarta.
SeqHound data service is currently disabled (pending bug fixes in the SeqHound web API.)
Includes first round of JUnit test cases for automated testing.
